description: Green cotton fatigues, ussued as a hot-weather uniform by the WW2 era U.S. Army. It should protect decently well, though don't expect it to block bullets.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A tough waist-length jacket with lots of pockets, developed in World War 2.  Favored by the U.S. military for years after, its still used by many government agencies due to its effective design. Its fancy, as far as army apparel goes, and is useful in all kinds of circumstances.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

World War 2 era jump boots. Incredibly thick and sturdy, theyre not as comfortable as modern designs. At the least, theyre reinforced greater than normal combat boots, to protect paratroopers legs while they were dropping.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
